subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: The winner of the Preakness Stakes, Lookin at Lucky, and the Kentucky Derby champion, Super Saver, will skip the third leg of horse racing’s Triple Crown.
snippet: The winner of the Preakness Stakes, Lookin at Lucky, and the Kentucky Derby champion, Super Saver, will skip the third leg of horse racing’s Triple Crown.
